tool_description: Calculates the precise heliocentric or geocentric position of planets using astronomical ephemeris data for a given Julian date.

planet.description: Planet name: Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto

error_messages: Invalid planet name: Use Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, or Pluto
Invalid coordinate system: Use either heliocentric or geocentric
Julian day out of range: Provide Julian day between 1800000 and 2900000
Invalid precision level: Use low, medium, or high
usage: Provide julian_day and planet name. Optionally specify coordinate_system and precision. Returns the planet's position in ecliptic coordinates.

distance.description: Distance from reference point in AU

velocity.description: Angular velocity in degrees per day
